**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Performed this type of crash '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Log Files**
If possible please include the logfiles from the agent and the core dump composer
See [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/IBM/core-dump-handler#troubleshooting) for more information.

 - Host OS: [e.g. ubuntu, RHEL, CoreOS]
